mapper.update: update activity_cash_back set activity_id = #{activity_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cash_back_all = #{cash_back_all,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cash_back_rate = #{cash_back_rate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cash_back_type = #{cash_back_type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, activity_cash_back_remark = #{activity_cash_back_remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, cash_back_supplier_ids = #{cash_back_supplier_ids,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, cash_back_supplier_serieses = #{cash_back_supplier_serieses,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, cash_back_commodity_ids = #{cash_back_commodity_ids,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where activity_cash_back_id = #{activity_cash_back_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select activity_cash_back_id, activity_id, cash_back_all, cash_back_rate, cash_back_type, activity_cash_back_remark, cash_back_supplier_ids, cash_back_supplier_serieses, cash_back_commodity_ids from activity_cash_back where activity_cash_back_id = #{activity_cash_back_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
